com.github.valid8j.fluent.internals

Enum ValidationFluents

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ValidationFluents>
      • com.github.valid8j.fluent.internals.ValidationFluents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ValidationFluents>

    public enum ValidationFluents
extends Enum<ValidationFluents>

    A facade class to provide fluent versions of valid8j entry points. You can pass Statement objects created by static methods in Statement interface such as objectValue, stringValue, intValue, etc.

    See Also:
    Statement
